featured.text: Haydn, Schubert, and others wrote guitar music.

definition.zh_def: 海頓（Franz Joseph Haydn）是奧地利作曲家，被譽為交響曲和弦樂四重奏的奠基人之一。
definition.en_def: Haydn is an Austrian composer known as one of the founders of the symphony and string quartet.
definition.example: Haydn's symphonies are celebrated for their innovative structures and melodies.
